content: पालिः --ली {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The tip of the ear; श्रवणपालिः <ls>Gīt. 3.</ls> {@--2@} The edge, skirt, margin; <ls>Bh. 3. 55.</ls> {@--3@} The sharp side, edge or point of anything (अश्रि); <ls>Bv. 2. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Boundary, limit. {@--5@} A line, row; विपुलपुलकपाली <ls>Gīt. 6</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 51.</ls> {@--6@} A spot, mark. {@--7@} A causeway, bridge. {@--8@} The lap or bosom. {@--9@} An oblong pond. {@--10@} Maintenance of a pupil by his teacher during the period of his studies. {@--11@} A louse. {@--12@} Praise, eulogium. {@--13@} A woman with a beard. {@--14@} The hip. {@--15@} A measure of capacity (प्रस्थ). {@--16@} A circumference. --ली A pot, boiler.
